name: !fishing enable
description: Enable fishing plugin on your server

name: !fishing disable
description: Disable fishing plugin on your server

name: !fishing rodprice { newPrice }
description: Update fishing rod price, this is where user will purchase for using currency

name: !fishing newaccount @user
description: Create fishing account for the user

name: !fishing create
description: Create new fishing items, this is where user can catch it from the item list

name: !fishing chance { newChance }
description: Set custom fishing rod broken chance

name: !fishing cooldown { newCooldown = second }
description: Set custom cooldown when user catch, this will prevent from spamming

name: !fishing resetcooldown @user
description: Reset user fishing cooldown to default

name: !fishing unban @user
description: Unban someone to start using fishing again

name: !fishing sell { itemId } { amount }
description: Sell item from your fishing inventory

name: !fishing delete { itemId }
description: Delete that item from the fishing list, this will also remove that item from user fishing inventory as well
